name: Monochrome Jump
description:
A very simple platformer game made for the mid-year Flame Game Jam.

Use Spacebar (or left click) to jump!

Assets used:

Fonts:

Silkscreen:     Designed by Jason Kottke, licensed under the SIL Open Font License.

                https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Silkscreen

Audio:

                https://freemusicarchive.org/music/holiznacc0/chiptunes/red-skies/

jump__005:      Designed by phoenix1291, licensed under the CC0 1.0 Universal Public Domain Dedication.

                https://opengameart.org/content/sfx-the-ultimate-2017-8-bit-mini-pack

ouch_002:       Designed by phoenix1291, licensed under the CC0 1.0 Universal Public Domain Dedication.

                https://opengameart.org/content/sfx-the-ultimate-2017-8-bit-mini-pack
